### Tasks for CTU to provide {.unnumbered}

```{r tasks, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(gt)
tmp <- params$workpackages %>%
  select_for_pdf() %>%
  group_by(Service) %>%
  mutate(Cost = format(Cost, big.mark = ",", nsmall = 2))

breaks <- as.numeric(params$break_tasks)
n_breaks <- length(breaks)
breaks_tf <- n_breaks > 0

gt_fn <- function(x){
  gt::gt(x) %>%
    gt::tab_options(table.font.size = "12px",
                    table.width = "100%",
                    row_group.background.color = "white",
                    data_row.padding = "2px",
                    table.font.names = "Arial",
                    table.font.color = "black",
                    table.font.color.light = "black")
}

gt_widths <- function(x){
  x %>%
    gt::cols_width(Task ~ "20%",
                   Description ~ "62.5%",
                   Hours ~ "7.5%",
                   Cost ~ "10%",
    )
}

```

```{r tasks0, echo = FALSE, eval = !breaks_tf, message=FALSE}
## no breaks
tmp %>%
  gt_fn() |>
  gt_widths()
```

```{r tasks1, echo = FALSE, eval = breaks_tf & n_breaks > 0}
ends <- c(breaks, nrow(tmp))
starts <- c(1, breaks + 1)

index <- (starts[1]):(ends[1])
tmp2 <- tmp[index ,]
# print(tmp2)

tmp2 |>
  as.data.frame() |>
  gt_fn() |>
  gt_widths()
```

```{r tasks2, echo = FALSE, eval = breaks_tf & n_breaks >= 1}
index <- (starts[2]):(ends[2])
tmp2 <- tmp[index ,]
# print(tmp2)

tmp2 |>
  as.data.frame() |>
  gt_fn() |>
  gt_widths()
```

```{r tasks3, echo = FALSE, eval = breaks_tf & n_breaks >= 2}
index <- (starts[3]):(ends[3])
tmp2 <- tmp[index ,]
print(tmp2)

tmp2 |>
  as.data.frame() |>
  gt_fn() |>
  gt_widths()
```


```{r expenses, echo = FALSE, eval = !is.null(params$expenses)}
cat("Expenses\n\n")
gt_fn(params$expenses)
```
